@필요한_기능만_선택하세요@: Choose only the features you need. Upgrade or downgrade anytime with no hidden fees.

@언제든_플랜을_변경할_수_있나요@: Can I change my plan anytime?
@네_언제든지_플랜을_업그레이드하거나_다운그레이드할_수_있습니다@: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

@비즈니스_플랜은_어떤_기능이_추가되나요@: What additional features does the Business plan offer?
